title: Add a link to https://dev.windowsphone.com/en-us/Account/Summary that links to the password change page at https://dev.windowsphone.com.
body: Please add a link to https://dev.windowsphone.com/en-us/Account/Summary that links to the password change page at https://dev.windowsphone.com. Also add the same LIVE profile password change link to the Windows Store profile.

comments.body: .... wait ... I meant you should link to the Windows LIVE password change page at: https://account.live.com/password/change?mkt=en-US
